questiontext.text:
Example

How many car registrations are there beginning with \(NP05\) followed by three letters? Note that, conventionally, \(I, O\) and \(Q\) may not be chosen..

Solution

We have to choose 3 letters from 23 allowing repetition. Hence the number of registrations beginning with \(NP05\) must be \(23^3=12167\).
